title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Viral Challenge
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A desperate-for-fame traveler attempts an increasingly dangerous series of viral challenges for TikTok views, culminating in the "Blackout Challenge" that lives up to its name permanently.

death_teaser: Going viral isn't always a good thing.
